personalInfo.title: Your Personal Information
personalInfo.description: Provide accurate personal details to receive tailored fitness and nutrition recommendations.

goal.title: Goals
goal.goalAdvice: Not sure where to start? We recommend choosing 'Maintain Weight' for the first 2-4 weeks. This allows you to establish a baseline and get used to tracking food without the stress of a strict diet. You can switch to Fat Loss or Muscle Building later.
goal.description: Select your primary goal. This will adjust your calorie and macronutrient recommendations. You can change this anytime.
goal.warning: Please notice that selecting any of these will calculate new nutritional targets and replace your existing ones.

lose_weight.title: Fat Loss
lose_weight.description: Moderate calorie deficit (-15%). Goal: Reduce body fat while preserving muscle mass.

maintain_weight.title: Maintain Weight
maintain_weight.description: Balanced energy intake. Ideal for diet breaks, improving athletic performance, or body recomposition.

gain_weight.title: Build Muscle
gain_weight.description: Calorie surplus (+15%). Note: Strength training is required to build muscle rather than fat.

activityLevel.title: Activity Levels
activityLevel.levelAdvice: If you're unsure between two levels, choose the lower one. Most people overestimate their energy expenditure. It's better to start with a lower figure and increase it if you feel very hungry or your weight drops too quickly.
activityLevel.description: Select your activity level. This will adjust your calorie and macronutrient recommendations. You can change this anytime.
activityLevel.warning: Please notice that selecting any of these will calculate new nutritional targets and replace your existing ones.

sedentary.title: Sedentary
sedentary.description: Sedentary job (office, remote work, driving). No workouts. Less than 5,000 steps per day.

light.title: Lightly Active
light.description: Sedentary job + light exercise 1-3 times/week or regular walks. 5,000 - 10,000 steps per day.

moderate.title: Moderately Active
moderate.description: On your feet job or intense exercise 3-5 times/week. 10,000 - 15,000 steps per day.

active.title: Very Active
active.description: Hard physical job or intense exercise daily. 15,000 - 20,000 steps per day.

extra_active.title: Extra Active
extra_active.description: Professional athlete (two workouts a day) or grueling physical labor. More than 20,000 steps per day.

errors.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters.
errors.activityLevelRequired: Activity level is required for correct calculation.
errors.genericNotEmpty: This field can not be empty.
errors.ageRange: Age must be between 14 years and 120 years.
errors.heightRange: Height must be between 100 cm and 250 cm.
errors.weightRange: Weight must be between 30 kg and 300 kg.
errors.passwordRequirements: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character.
